World-first NZ study: Are baby food pouches really unhealthy for kids? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/world-first-nz-study-are-baby-food-pouches-really-unhealthy-for-kids/55QW7PB6YFELXKEFJO5HQVFRKI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/world-first-nz-study-are-baby-food-pouches-really-unhealthy-for-kids/55QW7PB6YFELXKEFJO5HQVFRKI/ Jamie MortonNZ researchers test claims baby food pouches are unhealthy – with surprising results. Sun, 03 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 An Otago University study that tracked eating habits among nearly 1000 children found most infants were spoon-fed, and when they did consume food from pouches, they were often seated in high chairs, supervised by an adult.

Hidden risk: What scientists just discovered about NZ’s coastal flooding danger https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hidden-risk-what-scientists-just-discovered-about-nzs-coastal-flooding-danger/BGH7JLGYXZDG7NNAIQ2UWIHYJQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hidden-risk-what-scientists-just-discovered-about-nzs-coastal-flooding-danger/BGH7JLGYXZDG7NNAIQ2UWIHYJQ/ Jamie MortonFirst-of-its-kind study reveals large but hidden chunk of population facing flood risk. Sun, 03 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Thousands of East Coast residents were cut off in the aftermath of last year's Cyclone Gabrielle, which swamped Wairoa. Scientists have taken a closer look at indirect risks from coastal flooding.
